author: rasmus
msg: When writing the SERVER_SUBVERSION -D flag to ap_config.h it came out
When including this in a file you end up with an unterminated string
constant.  We want it to look like this instead:
The backslashes are only needed in the actual -D argument.
This little patch makes sure that any \" from a -D is replaced with just "

author: marc
msg: Use HTTPD_ROOT instead of /usr/local/apache; the intent is obviously to
default to having them all below HTTPD_ROOT, so we may as well just do that.
